titles.title: Urging a peaceful resolution of the conflict over Kashmir, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

bill.summary: 1/25/2005--Introduced. Urges: (1) all parties involved to find a peaceful resolution to the Kashmir conflict; (2) the Governments of India and Pakistan to include Kashmiri leaders in the Kashmir dialogue; and (3) the President to appoint a Special Envoy to support dialogue, negotiations, and a resolution of the such conflict. Commends: (1) the Governments of India and Pakistan for the November 2003 cease-fire agreement, ongoing dialogue, the agreement on the basic road map for peace negotiations, and confidence building measures to promote peace; and (2) nongovernmental and humanitarian organizations for their work in Kashmir.
